title: LP Rail App
author: Jagadeesh Mandala
description: An internal tool developed for LP Rail Products, a startup company. The app streamlines and manages workflow processes using React Native and Firebase.

sections.content: LP Rail App is a comprehensive internal tool designed to streamline workflow processes for LP Rail Products. Built with React Native and Firebase, it provides a robust platform for managing rail-related operations.

Key Features:
- Real-time data synchronization using Firebase
- Cross-platform compatibility with Expo
- TypeScript implementation for type safety
- Secure authentication and authorization
- Offline data persistence
